name: Bright Gypsy Vanner
description:
For as long as I can remember I've loved horses and drawing. Their elegance, power, and grace always entrance me. There is hardly a better feeling on this Earth than gaining the trust of a horse, and it's then a huge responsibility not to betray that trust. To have the gift to capture their spirit in a picture like this is truly a blessing.

"Don't be the rider who gallops all night and never sees the horse that is beneath him" - Rumi
